title: Cashing Out Investments To Pay Off Debt (Hour 3)
description:
Dave Ramsey & Kristina Ellis discuss:

Using mutual funds to pay off student loans,

How company stocks are taxed,

Renting post-high school,

Paying on a parent-plus loan,

Baby step 3B when building a house.


Gazelle – Terms & Conditions Apply. Visit www.ramseysolutions.com/gazelle for more information. Established by Pathward, N.A., Member FDIC.
